'Serious Breach Of Oath, Insults Constitution': Kerala CM On Nitesh Rane's 'Mini-Pakistan' Remarks - News18
summary:
Kerala CM Criticizes Nitesh Rane's 'Mini-Pakistan' Remarks

Date: December 31, 2024
Source: News18

Kerala Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan condemned Maharashtra BJP Minister Nitesh Rane’s remarks calling Kerala a 'mini-Pakistan', describing it as a serious breach of oath and an insult to the Constitution.

  • Vijayan labeled Rane's comments as highly provocative and reflective of the Sangh Parivar's overall approach towards Kerala.
  • Opposition leaders called for Rane’s resignation, deeming his statements as hate speech that fosters division.
  • Rane's remarks sparked significant backlash from opposition parties and national discourse regarding their implications.
“The minister who made the hateful statement does not deserve to continue in that position,” - CM Pinarayi Vijayan

The incident highlights ongoing political tensions in India, reflecting broader issues of identity and communal relations.
newTitle: Kerala CM Criticizes Nitesh Rane's 'Mini-Pakistan' Remarks

title: Bigg Boss 18: Kangana Ranaut calls out Avinash Mishra for his ‘overacting; says, “Natural raho, ussi ke p - The Times of India
summary:
Kangana Ranaut Critiques Avinash Mishra's Acting on Bigg Boss 18

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The latest episode of Bigg Boss 18 featured actress Kangana Ranaut, who humorously advised contestant Avinash Mishra to tone down his dramatic acting style.

  • Kangana made a special appearance, offering advice and engaging with contestants.
  • She advised Avinash, saying, “Overacting nahi karna hai, natural, ussi ke paise milte hai” (Don’t overact, be natural; that’s what gets you paid).
  • The episode included a task where contestants had to give doses and treatments.
  • Kangana's entry generated excitement and brought a lighter mood to the show.
  • Avinash remains popular among fans for his entertaining antics, which sometimes spark debate.
Kangana's feedback highlighted the balance between entertainment and natural performance expected from contestants.

As Bigg Boss 18 unfolds, the interactions with prominent guests like Kangana continue to enhance the show's entertainment value.
newTitle: Kangana Ranaut Critiques Avinash Mishra's Acting on Bigg Boss 18

title: OpenAI Whistleblower Suchir Balaji’s Mother Speaks Out: ‘Elon Musk Believes It’s A Murder’ - News18
summary:
Mother of OpenAI Whistleblower Claims Elon Musk Suspects Murder

Date: December 31, 2024

Source: CNN-News18

Suchir Balaji's mother, Poornima Rao, asserts that police did not properly investigate her son's death, which has been labeled a suicide by authorities. She believes that Elon Musk suspects foul play surrounding the incident.

  • Suchir Balaji was a 26-year-old researcher at OpenAI.
  • He was discovered dead in his apartment in San Francisco.
  • Despite police findings of no foul play, the family hired a private investigator to challenge the ruling of suicide.
  • Poornima reports disturbing signs at the scene, including a ransacked desktop and blood spots.
  • No suicide note was found, and the family has not been permitted to see the body.
  • Musk questioned the official conclusion, stating it did not seem like a suicide.
“This doesn’t seem like a suicide.” - Elon Musk

The incident has garnered significant attention, with calls for intervention from U.S. authorities and skepticism about the circumstances surrounding Balaji's death.
newTitle: Mother of OpenAI Whistleblower Claims Elon Musk Suspects Murder

title: Most anticipated movies of 2025: Captain America: Brave New World, Superman, Jurassic World Rebirth and more - Hindustan Times
summary:
Most Anticipated Movies of 2025: Captain America: Brave New World, Superman, Jurassic World Rebirth and More

Date: Jan 01, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

This article highlights some of the most anticipated films set to release in 2025, spanning various genres and featuring both new and returning characters.

  • Captain America: Brave New World - Releases on February 14, featuring Sam Wilson as Captain America.
  • Snow White - Scheduled for March 21, starring Rachel Zegler and directed by Marc Webb.
  • Thunderbolts - Set for May 2, a Marvel film that focuses on an all-villain team.
  • Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning - Tom Cruise returns in this May 23 release.
  • Jurassic World Rebirth - Releasing on July 2, set five years after Jurassic World Dominion.
  • Superman - David Corenswet stars in this July 11 release directed by James Gunn.
“Superman embarks on a journey to reconcile his Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing as Clark Kent.”

These films promise to deliver exciting stories and experiences for moviegoers in 2025.
newTitle: Most Anticipated Movies of 2025: A Sneak Peek

summary:
World Blitz Championship 2024 LIVE Updates, Knockouts: Vaishali beats Jiner to reach semis; Niemann loses to Carlsen in quarters

Date: January 01, 2025

Source: Sportstar

On January 1, 2025, R. Vaishali advanced to the semifinals of the World Blitz Championship 2024 after defeating Zhu Jiner, while Magnus Carlsen eliminated Hans Niemann in the quarterfinals.

  • Vaishali defeated Jiner to secure her place in the semifinals against Ju Wenjun.
  • Magnus Carlsen overcame Hans Niemann, securing his spot in the semifinals.
  • Vaishali had previously shown strong play, qualifying with an impressive score of 9.5/11.
  • Controversies arose during the tournament, particularly surrounding cheating allegations associated with Niemann.

title: Heartbreaking Last Photo Of Boy, 3, Youngest Victim Killed In South Korea Plane Crash - News18
summary:
Heartbreaking Last Photo Of Boy, 3, Youngest Victim Killed In South Korea Plane Crash

Date: December 31, 2024 Source: News18

A devastating final photo emerged of the three-year-old boy who was killed in the South Korean plane crash alongside his parents. Kang Ko, his wife Jin Lee Seon, and their son were tragically lost in the Jeju Air Boeing 737-800 crash while attempting an emergency landing at Muan International Airport.

  • The plane crash claimed 179 lives on December 31, 2024.
  • The boy was on his first trip abroad for Christmas.
  • Kang Ko worked in public relations for the Kia Tigers baseball team.
  • Two flight attendants were the only survivors among the 181 people onboard.
  • Authorities are investigating the crash.
“He was so good at his job that everyone on our company’s baseball broadcasting team liked him.” - Jung Woo-young

This tragic event highlights the fragility of life and the deep impact such incidents have on families and communities.
newTitle: Heartbreaking Last Photo Of Boy, 3, Youngest Victim Killed In South Korea Plane Crash

Sunita Williams to Celebrate New Year 2025 16 Times in Space

Date: 31 Dec 2024 | Source: LiveMint

Astronaut Sunita Williams and the Expedition 72 crew will uniquely celebrate New Year’s by witnessing 16 sunrises and sunsets in just 24 hours while aboard the International Space Station (ISS).

  • Astronaut Sunita Williams and her crew are prepared to celebrate New Year’s Eve in a distinctive manner from space.
  • The ISS crew will see 16 different sunrises and sunsets during the 24-hour period of New Year's Eve and New Year's Day.
“Witnessing New Year 2025 from orbit is a truly unique experience!” - Sunita Williams

This celebration marks a remarkable event in space exploration and draws attention to human achievements in science and technology.

title: Puerto Rico’s power grid collapses, leaving island in the dark - DAWN.com
summary:
Puerto Rico Faces Widespread Power Outage on New Year’s Eve

Publication Date: New Year’s Eve

Source: LUMA Energy

Puerto Ricans were left without electricity early on New Year’s Eve due to a grid failure affecting nearly the entire island.

  • Approximately 90% of clients lost power on Tuesday morning at 9:30 AM (6:30 PST).
  • Restoration of power is expected to take 24 to 48 hours, pending conditions.
  • The cause of the outage is under investigation, with preliminary findings suggesting a failure in an underground line.
  • Governor Pedro Pierluisi has called for accountability from energy providers.
  • Puerto Rico has a history of frequent power outages, exacerbated by past infrastructure issues and Hurricane Maria.
“This is a major incident,” said Ivan Baez, spokesperson for power generator Genera.

Residents are urged to stay informed as efforts continue to restore power across the island.
newTitle: Puerto Rico Faces Widespread Power Outage on New Year’s Eve

title: WhatsApp UPI: NPCI removes user onboarding restriction limits, company aims to hike user base | Company Business News - Mint
summary:
WhatsApp UPI: NPCI Removes User Onboarding Limits to Boost User Base

Date: December 31, 2023 Source: Economic Times

India's National Payments Corporation has lifted the onboarding limit for WhatsApp Pay, allowing the platform to serve its entire user base for UPI services.

  • The NPCI's decision enables WhatsApp Pay to operate without user restrictions.
  • Compliance with existing UPI guidelines will continue despite the removal of limits.
  • Experts suggest this move enhances accessibility and positions WhatsApp as a key player in the digital payments landscape.
  • Mohan K, tech entrepreneur, emphasized smoother UPI adoption for everyday transactions due to this change.
“The removal of the UPI onboarding limit for WhatsApp Pay not only makes UPI payments more accessible and convenient for a wider audience.” - Mohan K

The adjustment is expected to facilitate increased use of UPI for various transactions across WhatsApp, enhancing its competitiveness in India's digital payments space.
newTitle: WhatsApp UPI: NPCI Removes User Onboarding Limits to Boost User Base

title: Baby John box office collection day 7: Varun Dhawan film ends first week with barely any growth, mints over ₹32 crore - Hindustan Times
summary:
Baby John box office collection day 7: Varun Dhawan film ends first week with barely any growth, mints over ₹32 crore

Date: Dec 31, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The Varun Dhawan-starrer 'Baby John' was released on December 25 but has seen a steady decline in box office collections over its first week, managing to mint just over ₹32 crore.

  • The film opened strongly with ₹11.25 crore on its first day.
  • However, a significant drop was observed on the second day with earnings of ₹4.75 crore, marking a 57.78% decline.
  • By the seventh day, the film collected approximately ₹1.81 crore.
  • Overall occupancy in Hindi was reported at 10.68% on December 31.
“Overall, there’s nothing much that makes Baby John stand out apart from the action.”

The film, directed by Kalees and features other actors like Keerthy Suresh and Jackie Shroff, tells the story of a police officer who must confront his past to protect his daughter. Despite its mixed reviews, the film has struggled to perform well at the box office.
newTitle: Baby John Box Office Collection on Day 7 Shows Decline

title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 27: Allu Arjun film continues its dream run, crosses ₹1170 crore - Hindustan Times
summary:
Pushpa 2 The Rule Box Office Collection Day 27

Date: Dec 31, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Sukumar’s Pushpa 2: The Rule continues to thrive at the box office, crossing ₹1170 crore in India in its 27th day of release.

  • On day 27, the film earned approximately ₹6.97 crore.
  • It performed better than the newly released Baby John, starring Varun Dhawan.
  • Initial week earnings were ₹725.8 crore, followed by ₹264.8 crore in week two and ₹129.5 crore in week three.

Controversy Note

The film faced scrutiny when an incident occurred at its premiere, resulting in the death of a fan, leading to Allu Arjun's temporary arrest.

In conclusion, Pushpa 2 is marking a remarkable run at the box office and is set to impact future releases.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Box Office Continues Strong Performance, Crosses ₹1170 Crore

title: 10 diet types you must adopt in 2025 for a healthy heart - The Times of India
summary:
10 Diet Types You Must Adopt in 2025 for a Healthy Heart

Publication Date: Dec 31, 2024 | Source: TimesOfIndia.com

As we approach 2025, adopting heart-friendly diets will be crucial for maintaining cardiovascular health and overall well-being.

  • Heart-friendly diets reduce inflammation and cholesterol.
  • Main types include Mediterranean diet, DASH diet, Paleo diet, and more.
  • These diets emphasize whole, nutrient-dense foods.
  • Intermittent fasting may also contribute to heart health by lowering blood pressure and cholesterol levels.
  • A focus on low-sodium and plant-based foods can support longevity.
"Embracing diets that are heart-friendly in 2025 will be key to an individual's proper cardiovascular health." - Nitesh Poojari

The adoption of these diets may lead to improved heart health and decreased long-term health risks.
newTitle: 10 Diet Types You Must Adopt in 2025 for a Healthy Heart

title: 5 warning signs of Vitamin B12 deficiency in your feet you shouldn't ignore - The Times of India
summary:
5 Warning Signs of Vitamin B12 Deficiency in Your Feet

Publication Date: [Date not provided] Source: Times of India

The symptoms of Vitamin B12 deficiency can lead to nerve damage and affect daily life. It's essential to recognize early signs to prevent irreversible damage.

  • Numbness and tingling in feet
  • Burning sensation in extremities
  • Difficulty walking or loss of balance
  • Pale or yellowish skin on feet
  • Persistent cold feet
“According to the National Institutes of Health (NIH), peripheral neuropathy caused by B12 deficiency can become irreversible if untreated.”

Recognizing these signs early can help in addressing Vitamin B12 deficiency and maintaining overall nerve health.
newTitle: 5 Warning Signs of Vitamin B12 Deficiency in Your Feet

title: WB 1-0 KER Highlights, Santosh Trophy 2024-25 Final: Robi scores in stoppage time to hand West Bengal 33rd title - Sportstar
summary:
WB 1-0 KER Highlights, Santosh Trophy 2024-25 Final: Robi scores in stoppage time to hand West Bengal 33rd title

Date Published: December 31, 2024 | Source: Sportstar

West Bengal defeated Kerala 1-0 in the final match of the Santosh Trophy 2024-25 played at the Gachibowli Stadium in Hyderabad, clinching their 33rd title in a dramatic finish.

  • Robi scored the match-winning goal during stoppage time, sealing the victory for West Bengal.
  • This marks West Bengal's record-extending 33rd Santosh Trophy title.
  • The final showcased a tight contest, with West Bengal maintaining historical dominance over Kerala.
"Robi scores!! Manotos Maji heads the ball into the box for Robi Hansda who has the easiest of finishes from point-blank range."

The victory reaffirms West Bengal's status as a powerhouse in Indian football, continuing their legacy in the prestigious Santosh Trophy.
newTitle: West Bengal Secures 33rd Santosh Trophy Title with Last-Minute Goal

title: No talk with me, India won’t back any regime change move in Maldives, says former President Nasheed - The Indian Express
summary:
Nasheed Responds to Claims of Indian Involvement in Maldives Regime Change

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: The Indian Express

Former President of Maldives, Mohamed Nasheed, addressed reports of a supposed plot involving Indian intelligence and the Maldivian Opposition to oust current President Mohamed Muizzu. He clarified that India would not support such efforts.

  • Nasheed refutes claims that he was involved in talks for regime change supported by India.
  • Reports suggest a plan to bribe MPs and military officials to impeach President Muizzu.
  • Indian government sources denied any involvement, labeling the report a “figment of imagination”.
“I do not believe that India will be willing to assist the Maldives Opposition in regime change and they certainly have never had any such conversation with me,” Nasheed stated.

Nasheed emphasizes India's respect for Maldivian democracy and highlights the importance of strengthening democratic processes in the Maldives.
newTitle: Nasheed Responds to Claims of Indian Involvement in Maldives Regime Change
